text: ham*aW/*ׂA'<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r xAzA<ZQP>h x<HPA>baq*<TIP>w*q han*Abi<SIL>y':
`ad='A<DAR>nAh y@hwA<TEB>h Siw*a<TIP>`@t*iy w@lo<MUN>' tiS@mA<ATN>` 'Ez@`a<MER>q 'elE<TEB>ykA xAmA<TIP>s w@lo<MER>' tw^oSi<SIL>y`a:
lA<MUN>m*Ah tar@'e<MEH>niy 'A<AZL>wEn<PAS> w@`AmA<MUN>l t*ab*i<ZQP>yT w@So<MER>d w@xAmA<TIP>s l@nEg@d*i<ATN>y way@hi<DAR>y ri<MEK>yb w*mAd<TIP>w^on yiW/*ׂA<SIL>':
`al=k*en<PAS> t*Ap<MUN>w*g t*w^orA<ZQP>h w@lo<SIL>'=yeYe<MER>' lAnE<TIP>Yax miS@p*A<ATN>T k*i<MEH>y rASA`<PAS> mak@t*i<MUN>yr 'Et=haY*ad*i<ZQP>yq `al=k*e<TEB>n yeYe<MER>' miS@p*A<TIP>T m@`uq*A<SIL>l:
r@'<MEH>w* bag*w^oyim<PAS> w@<SIL>hab*i<ZQP>yTw* w@hi<SIL>t*am*@h<TIP>w* t*@mA<ATN>hw* k*iy=po<AZL>`al<PAS> p*o`e<MUN>l b*i<SIL>ymeykE<ZQP>m lo<MER>' ta<SIL>'<HPA>mi<TIP>ynw* k*i<MER>y y@sup*A<SIL>r:
k*i<SIL>y=hin@ni<MEH>y meqiym<PAS> 'Et=hak*aW@d*i<ZQP>ym hag*<TIP>w^oy ham*a<MUN>r w@han*im@hA<ATN>r ha<SIL>hw^olek@<PAS> l@mEr@x<HPA>bey='E<ZQP>rEY lArE<TIP>SEt miS@k*An<MER>w^ot l*o'=l<SIL>w^o:
'Ayo<MER>m w@nw^orA<TIP>' h<ATN>w*' mim*E<ZQM>n*w* miS@p*AT<MER>w^o w*W@'et<TIP>w^o yeYe<SIL>':

w@qal*<AZL>w* min*@meri<GER>ym sw*sA<RBM>yw w@xad*w*<PAS> miz*@'e<MUN>bey `E<ZQP>rEb w*pA<TIP>Sw* p*A<SIL>rASA<ATN>yw w*pA<SIL>rASAyw<PAS> me<SIL>rAx<MUN>w^oq yAbo<ZQP>'w* yA`u<ZQM>pw* k*@nE<TIP>SEr xA<MER>S lE<SIL>'<HSE>k<SIL>w^ol:
k*ul*oh<PAS> l@xAmA<MUN>s yAb<ZQP>w^o' m@gam*a<MER>t p*@neyhE<TIP>m qAdi<ATN>ymAh way*E<SIL>'<HSE>so<MER>p k*ax<TIP>w^ol SE<SIL>biy:
w@hw*'<PAS> b*am*@lAki<MUN>ym yit@qal*A<ZQP>s w@ro<SIL>z@ni<TIP>ym miW@xA<MUN>q l<ATN>w^o h<YET>w*' l@kAl=mib@YA<MUN>r yiW@xA<ZQP>q way*iY@b*o<MER>r `ApA<TIP>r wa<SIL>y*il@k*@dA<SIL>h*:
'A<MUN>z xAla<MER>p r<TEB>w*xa wa<SIL>y*a`<HPA>bo<TIP>r w@'ASe<ATN>m z<MER>w* kox<TIP>w^o le<SIL>'loh<SIL>w^o:
h<HPA>l<DAR>w^o' 'at*A<MUN>h miq*E<RBM>dEm y@hwA<DAR>h '<HSE>loha<TEB>y q@doSi<TIP>y lo<MUN>' nAm<ATN>w*t y@hwAh<PAS> l@miS@p*A<MUN>T Wam@t*<ZQP>w^o w@Y<TIP>w*r l@hw^oki<MER>yxa y@sad@t*<SIL>w^o:

T@h<MEH>w^or `eyna<AZL>yim<PAS> me<SIL>r@'<MUN>w^ot rA<ZQP>` w@hab*i<MER>yT 'El=`AmA<TIP>l lo<MUN>' tw*kA<ATN>l lA<MEH>m*Ah tab*iyT<PAS> b*<SIL>w^og@di<ZQP>ym t*a<SIL>x<HPA>ri<ZQM>yS b*@bal*a<MER>` rASA<TIP>` Yad*i<MER>yq mim*E<SIL>n*w*:
wat*a<SIL>`<HPA>WE<MER>h 'AdA<TIP>m k*id@ge<MUN>y hay*A<ATN>m k*@rE<TIP>mEW lo<SIL>'=moSe<MER>l b*<SIL>w^o:
k*ul*oh<PAS> b*@xak*A<MUN>h he<SIL>`<HPA>lA<ZQP>h y@gore<MUN>hw* b@xEr@m<ZQP>w^o w@ya<SIL>'as@pe<TIP>hw* b*@mik@mar@t*<ATN>w^o `al=k*e<TIP>n yiW@ma<MER>x w@yAgi<SIL>yl:
`al=k*en<PAS> y@zab*e<MUN>xa l@xEr@m<ZQP>w^o wi<SIL>yqaT*e<TIP>r l@mik@mar@t*<ATN>w^o k*i<MEH>y bAhe<AZL>m*Ah<PAS> SAme<MUN>n xEl@q<ZQP>w^o w*ma<SIL>'<HPA>kAl<TIP>w^o b*@ri'A<SIL>h:
ha<MER>`al k*e<TIP>n yAri<MUN>yq xEr@m<ATN>w^o w@tAmi<TEB>yd la<SIL>h<HPA>ro<MER>g g*w^oyi<TIP>m lo<MER>' yax@m<SIL>w^ol:

`al=miS@mar@t*i<MUN>y 'E<SIL>`<HSE>mo<ZQP>dAh w@'E<SIL>t@yaY*@bA<TIP>h `al=mAY<ATN>w^or wa<SIL>'<HPA>Yap*E<RBM>h lir@'w^ot<PAS> mah=y@dab*Er=b*i<ZQP>y w*mA<MER>h 'ASi<TIP>yb `al=t*<SIL>w^okax@t*i<SIL>y:
way*a<SIL>`<HPA>ne<MEH>niy y@hwAh<PAS> way*o<ZQP>'mEr k*@to<MUN>b xAz<ZQP>w^on w*bA'e<TIP>r `al=hal*ux<ATN>w^ot l@ma<MER>`an yAr<TIP>w*Y q<MER>w^ore' b<SIL>w^o:
k*i<MUN>y `<MEH>w^od xAzw^on<PAS> lam*w^o`e<ZQP>d w@yApe<MER>xa laq*e<TIP>Y w@lo<MUN>' y@kaz*e<ATN>b 'im=yit@mah@mAh*<PAS> xak*eh=l<ZQP>w^o k*iy=bo<MER>' yAbo<TIP>' lo<MER>' y@'axe<SIL>r:
hin*e<MUN>h `up*@lA<ZQP>h lo<SIL>'=yAS@rA<MER>h nap@S<TIP>w^o b*<ATN>w^o w@Yad*i<TIP>yq b*E'<HSE>m<SIL>w*nAt<MER>w^o yi<SIL>x@yE<SIL>h:

w@'ap<PAS> k*i<SIL>y=hay*a<MUN>yin b*oge<ZQP>d g*E<MER>bEr yAhi<TIP>yr w@lo<MUN>' yin@wE<ATN>h '<HPA>SEr<TLP> hir@xi<AZL>yb k*iS@'<GER>w^ol nap@S<RBM>w^o w@h<MEH>w*' kam*A<AZL>wEt<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' yiW@b*A<ZQP>` way*E<SIL>'<HSE>so<MEH>p 'elAyw<PAS> k*Al=hag*w^oyi<ZQP>m way*iq@b*o<MER>Y 'elA<TIP>yw k*Al=hA<SIL>`am*i<SIL>ym:

h<HPA>lw^o'='e<MUN>l*Eh kul*A<RBM>m `AlAyw<PAS> mASA<MUN>l yiW/*ׂA<ZQP>'w* w*m@liyYA<TIP>h xiyd<MUN>w^ot l<ATN>w^o w@yo'ma<RBM>r h<YET>w^oy ham*ar@b*E<MUN>h l*o'=l<ZQP>w^o `ad=mAta<ZQM>y w*mak@b*i<MER>yd `AlA<TIP>yw `ab@Ti<SIL>yT:
h<HPA>l<MUN>w^o' pE<RBM>ta` yAq<AZL>w*mw*<PAS> no<SIL>S@kE<ZQP>ykA w@yiq@Y<TIP>w* m@za`@z@`E<ATN>ykA w@hAyi<MER>ytA lim@Sis*<TIP>w^ot lA<SIL>mw^o:

k*i<SIL>y='at*A<MEH>h Sal*<AZL>w^otA<PAS> g*w^oyi<MUN>m rab*i<ZQP>ym y@SAl*<TIP>w*kA k*Al=yE<MUN>tEr `am*i<ATN>ym mid*@me<MEH>y 'AdAm<PAS> wa<SIL>x<HPA>mas='E<ZQP>rEY qir@yA<TIP>h w@kAl=yo<MER>S@bey bA<SIL>h*:
h<RBM>w^oy b*oYe<TEB>`a b*E<MER>Ya` rA<TIP>` l@beyt<ATN>w^o lAW<MEH>w*m b*am*Arw^om<PAS> qin*<ZQP>w^o l@hin*AYe<TIP>l mik*ap=rA<SIL>`:
yA`a<MER>Y@t*A b*o<TIP>SEt l@beytE<ATN>kA q@Yw^ot=`am*i<MER>ym rab*i<TIP>ym w@xw^oTe<MER>' nap@SE<SIL>kA:
k*iy='E<TIP>bEn miq*i<MUN>yr t*iz@`A<ATN>q w@kApi<TIP>ys me`e<MER>Y ya<SIL>`<HPA>nE<SIL>n*Ah:
h<TEB>w^oy b*onE<MER>h `i<TIP>yr b*@dAmi<ATN>ym w@kw^one<MER>n qir@yA<TIP>h b*@`aw@lA<SIL>h:
h<HPA>l<MUN>w^o' hin*e<ZQP>h me'e<TIP>t y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>w^ot w@yi<SIL>yg@`<MEH>w* `am*iym<PAS> b*@dey='e<ZQP>S w*l@'um*i<TIP>ym b*@dey=ri<MER>yq yi`A<SIL>pw*:
k*i<YET>y t*im*Ale<MUN>' hA'A<ZQP>rEY lAda<TIP>`at 'Et=k*@b<MUN>w^od y@hwA<ATN>h k*am*a<TIP>yim y@kas*<MER>w* `al=yA<SIL>m:
h<YET>w^oy maS@qe<MUN>h re`e<ZQP>hw* m@sap*e<MER>xa x<HPA>mA<SIL>t@kA<TIP> w@'a<MUN>p Sak*e<ATN>r l@ma<MER>`an hab*i<TIP>yT `al=m@`<SIL>w^oreyhE<SIL>m:
WAba<MEH>`@t*A qAlw^on<PAS> mik*Ab<ZQP>w^od S@te<MER>h gam='a<TIP>t*Ah w@he<SIL>`Are<ATN>l t*is*<MUN>w^ob `AlE<RBM>ykA k*<YET>w^os y@mi<MUN>yn y@hwA<ZQP>h w@qi<SIL>yqAl<TIP>w^on `al=k*@bw^odE<SIL>kA:
k*i<MUN>y x<HPA>ma<MEH>s l@bAnw^on<PAS> y@kas*E<ZQP>k*A w@So<MER>d b*@hem<TIP>w^ot y@xiyta<ATN>n mid*@me<MEH>y 'AdAm<PAS> wa<SIL>x<HPA>mas='E<ZQP>rEY qir@yA<TIP>h w@kAl=yo<MER>S@bey bA<SIL>h*:

mA<SIL>h=hw^o`i<MUN>yl p*E<RBM>sEl k*i<MEH>y p@sAlw^o<PAS> yo<SIL>Y@r<ZQP>w^o mas*ekA<TIP>h w*m<MUN>w^orEh W/*.A<ATN>qEr k*i<MUN>y bATa<GAR>x yoYe<MEH>r yiY@rw^o<PAS> `AlA<ZQP>yw la<SIL>`<HPA>W<TIP>w^ot '<HSE>liyli<MER>ym 'il*@mi<SIL>ym:

h<MUN>w^oy 'ome<MEH>r lA`eY<PAS> hAqi<ZQP>yYAh `<TIP>w*riy l@'E<MUN>bEn d*w*mA<ATN>m h<MUN>w*' yw^orE<ZQP>h hin*eh=h<RBM>w*' t*Apw*W<PAS> zAhA<MUN>b wAkE<ZQP>sEp w@kAl=r<TIP>w*xa 'e<MER>yn b*@qir@b*<SIL>w^o:
wa<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h b*@heyka<MUN>l qAd@S<ATN>w^o ha<MER>s mip*AnA<TIP>yw k*Al=hA'A<SIL>rEY:
t*@pil*A<TIP>h la<SIL>x<HPA>baq*<MUN>w*q han*Abi<ATN>y' `a<TIP>l Sig@yon<SIL>w^ot:

y@hwA<RBM>h SAma<MUN>`@t*iy Sim@`<HPA>kA<ZIN> yAre'tiy<AST> y@hwA<RBM>h p*A<SIL>`Al@kA<PAS> b*@qE<MEH>rEb SAniym<PAS> xay*e<ZQP>yhw* b*@qE<MER>rEb SAni<TIP>ym t*w^odi<ATN>y`a b*@ro<TIP>gEz raxe<MER>m t*iz@k*<SIL>w^or:
'<HSE>l<AZL>w^oh*a<PAS> mit*eymA<MUN>n yAb<ZQP>w^o' w@qAd<MER>w^oS me<SIL>har=p*A'rA<TIP>n sE<ATN>lAh k*is*A<MEH>h SAma<AZL>yim<PAS> hw^od<ZQP>w^o w*t@hil*At<TIP>w^o mA<SIL>l@'A<MER>h hA'A<SIL>rEY:
w@no<AZL>gah*<PAS> k*A'<MUN>w^or t*i<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h qar@na<MER>yim miy*Ad<TIP>w^o l<ATN>w^o w@SA<TIP>m xEb@y<MER>w^on `uz*o<SIL>h:
l@pAnA<TIP>yw ye<MUN>lEk@ d*A<ATN>bEr w@yeYe<MER>' rE<TIP>SEp l@rag@lA<SIL>yw:

`Ama<MUN>d | way@mo<MUN>dEd 'E<RBM>rEY rA'Ah<PAS> way*at*e<MUN>r g*w^oyi<ZQP>m way*it@p*o<SIL>Y@Yw*<PAS> har@rey=`a<ZQP>d Sax<TIP>w* g*ib@`<MUN>w^ot `w^olA<ATN>m h<HPA>liyk<MER>w^ot `w^olA<TIP>m l<SIL>w^o:
t*a<MUN>xat 'A<ZQP>wEn rA'i<TIP>ytiy 'A<SIL>h<HQA>le<MUN>y kw*SA<ATN>n yir@g*@z<ZQM>w*n y@riy`<TIP>w^ot 'E<MER>rEY mid@yA<SIL>n:
h<HPA>bin@hAriym<PAS> xArA<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h 'i<MEH>m b*an*@hAriym<PAS> 'ap*E<ZQP>kA 'im=b*ay*A<TIP>m `Eb@rAtE<ATN>kA k*i<MEH>y tir@k*ab<PAS> `al=sw*sE<ZQP>ykA mar@k*@botE<TIP>ykA y@Sw*`A<SIL>h:
`Er@yA<MEH>h te`w^or<PAS> qaS@t*E<ZQP>kA S@bu`<MER>w^ot maT*<TIP>w^ot 'o<MUN>mEr sE<ATN>lAh n@hAr<TIP>w^ot t*@baq*a`='A<SIL>rEY:
rA'<MEH>w*kA yAxi<AZL>ylw*<PAS> hAri<ZQP>ym zE<MER>rEm ma<TIP>yim `AbA<ATN>r nAta<MEH>n t*@hw^om<PAS> qw^ol<ZQP>w^o r<TIP>w^om yAde<MER>yhw* nAWA<SIL>':
SE<MER>mES yAre<TIP>xa `A<MUN>mad z@bu<ATN>lAh l@'<MEH>w^or xiY*E<AZL>ykA<PAS> y@hal*e<ZQP>kw* l@no<TIP>gah* b*@ra<MER>q x<HPA>niytE<SIL>kA:
b*@za<TIP>`am t*iY@`ad='A<ATN>rEY b*@'a<TIP>p t*Ad<MER>w*S g*w^oyi<SIL>m:
yAYA<AZL>'tA<PAS> l@ye<MUN>Sa` `am*E<ZQP>kA l@ye<TIP>Sa` 'Et=m@SiyxE<ATN>kA mAxa<MEH>Y@t*A r*o'S<PAS> mib*e<MUN>yt rASA<ZQP>` `Ar<TEB>w^ot y@s<MER>w^od `ad=Yaw*A<TIP>'r sE<SIL>lAh:
nAqa<MEH>b@t*A b@maT*Ayw<PAS> ro<MUN>'S p*@rAzA<ZQP>w yis@`<HPA>r<TIP>w* la<SIL>h<HPA>piyYe<ATN>niy `<HPA>li<MUN>yYutA<ZQP>m k*@m<SIL>w^o=lE'<HSE>ko<MER>l `Ani<TIP>y b*am*is@t*A<SIL>r:
d*Ara<MER>k@t*A bay*A<TIP>m sw*sE<ATN>ykA xo<TIP>mEr ma<MER>yim rab*i<SIL>ym:

SAma<MUN>`@t*iy | wat*ir@g*a<MUN>z b*iT@ni<RBM>y l@qw^ol<PAS> YA<SIL>l@l<MUN>w* W@pAta<ZQP>y yAb<MER>w^o' rAqA<TEB>b b*a<SIL>`<HPA>YAma<TIP>y w@tax@t*a<MUN>y 'Er@g*A<ATN>z '<HPA>SE<MEH>r 'An<AZL>w*xa<PAS> l@y<MUN>w^om YArA<ZQP>h la<SIL>`<HPA>l<TIP>w^ot l@`a<MER>m y@gw*dE<SIL>n*w*:

k*i<SIL>y=t@'enA<MUN>h lo<SIL>'=tip@rA<RBM>x w@'e<MEH>yn y@bw*l<PAS> b*ag*@pAni<ZQP>ym k*ixeS<PAS> ma<SIL>`<HPA>Weh=za<ZQP>yit w*S@dem<TIP>w^ot lo'=`A<MUN>WAh 'o<ATN>kEl g*Aza<MEH>r mim*ik@lAh<PAS> Yo<ZQP>'n w@'e<MER>yn b*AqA<TIP>r b*A<SIL>r@pAti<SIL>ym:
wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<TIP>y b*a<SIL>yhwA<MUN>h 'E`@l<ATN>w^ozAh 'Agi<TIP>ylAh b*e<SIL>'lohe<MER>y yiS@`i<SIL>y:
y@hwi<MEH>h '<HPA>donAy<PAS> xeyli<ZQP>y way*A<MEH>WEm rag@lay<PAS> k*A<SIL>'ay*Al<ZQP>w^ot w@`a<MER>l b*A<SIL>mw^ota<TIP>y yad@rike<ATN>niy lam@naY*e<TIP>xa b*in@gi<SIL>ynw^otA<SIL>y:
